resources.string: Measurement of % O2 in the air at screen or roof(Entry prohibited if O2 20.5 and or 23)
Do not start up on shutdown equipment/installation without using appropriate,written operating procedure
Do not carry out work if you do not have right tool for the job and environment
Do not access installations or perform work without wearing general and task specific PPE
Do not perform work without valid work permit or authorization
Do not walk and stand under the load while lifting is taken place
Do not perform work without checking that power and product supply has been rendered inoperative
Do not enter confined space until isolation has been verified and the atmosphere checked
Do not perform excavation work without a valid work permit comprising a map of all underground hazards
Do not work at height without a safety harness when there is no collective protective equipment
Do not make any technical or organizational changes without prior authorization
Do not perform simultaneous operations or co activities without prior inspections
